text: Lai mai dan yue zhong, kaishi jiang shi “gulanjing”, zhidao shiren, zhaoshi mingzheng, yibian zunxun zhengdao, fenbie zhen wei, gu zai ci yue zhong, nimen yingdang zhaijie; hai bing huo luxing de ren, dang yi suo que de rishu bu zhai. Zhenzhuyao nimen bianli, buyao nimen kunnan, yibian nimen buzu suo que de rishu, yibian nimen zansong zhenzhu yindao nimen de ende, yibian nimen ganxie ta
